tasks.coref.i2b2

Class I2B2ToXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.coref.i2b2.I2B2ToXMLWriter

  • public class I2B2ToXMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to read i2b2/VA corpus documents from associated text, markable, and coreference chain files and write them as XML that can be understood by XMLReader class.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addConcepts

        public static void addConcepts(java.lang.String file,
                               Document doc)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Adds markables from the markable file to document representation.
        Parameters:
        file - the markable file
        doc - the document associated with the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is problem with file reading/writing

      • addCoreferenceChains

        public static void addCoreferenceChains(java.lang.String file,
                                        Document doc)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Adds coreference chains from the chain file to document representation.

        These are all added as instances of CoreferenceType.Ontological type, since the dataset does not make a distinction between different types.

        Parameters:
        file - the chain file
        doc - the document associated with the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is problem with file reading/writing

      • processSingleFile

        public static nu.xom.Element processSingleFile(java.lang.String id,
                                               java.lang.String txtFilename,
                                               java.lang.String concFilename,
                                               java.lang.String chainFilename)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Processes a single i2b2/VA discharge summary from the associated files and returns its XML representation.
        Parameters:
        id - the id for the document
        txtFilename - the text file of the document
        concFilename - the markable file
        chainFilename - the coreference chain file
        Returns:
        the XML representation of the document
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with file reading/writing

      • processDirectory

        public static void processDirectory(java.lang.String doc,
                                    java.lang.String conc,
                                    java.lang.String chain,
                                    java.lang.String out)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Processes i2b2/VA annotation files from respective directories and writes the corresponding text and XML files to the output directory. The output directory should be a valid directory. It will skip the document if the corresponding XML file already exists.
        Parameters:
        doc - the directory with text documents
        conc - the directory with markable files
        chain - the directory with coreference chain files
        out - the output directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with file reading/writing

      • init

        public static void init(java.util.Properties props)
                 throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Initializes CoreNLP and the sentence segmenter from properties.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to use for initialization
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the sentence segmenter class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the sentence segmenter cannot be accessed
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the sentence segmenter cannot be initializaed
